title: S- on Rakan not showing?????
body:
I recently got a S- with rakan but its not showing nor did it reward me any chests. Look at my match history for proof. Also, it seems loot has been disabled becuase when I hover my mouse over it, it says "Loot is temporarily disabled. Check service status for more information" Wtf
PLEASE HELP I NEED MY BRAGGING RIGHTS lol

replies.body: I'm looking over your account for that match, but it looks like the data hasn't been fully uploaded quite yet so I'm not able to see the score you got =\ . I'd hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can keep watch and fix anything that might need to be once we're able to see the score you got!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fVEpMREV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-21T03:32:16.109+0000)
>
> I'm looking over your account for that match, but it looks like the data hasn't been fully uploaded quite yet so I'm not able to see the score you got =\ . I'd hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can keep watch and fix anything that might need to be once we're able to see the score you got!

heres screenshot
http://imgur.com/a/SNVGV
sorry i actually got S lol

> [{quoted}](name=2kewl4life,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fVEpMREV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-21T04:04:17.235+0000)
>
> heres screenshot
> [](http://imgur.com/a/SNVGV)

http://imgur.com/a/cOP7r
Edit: My client updated and I got the chest, but not the icon saying my season highest score

Huzzah for getting that S and your chest ^_^!  Seriously major props for getting an S on a champ that new!

But I'm a little confused as to what icon you're referring to for season highest score? Are you referring to the season highest grade on your collection page? If so, that should update soon, and you could try forcing an update by closing and reopening the client.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fVEpMREV,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-21T04:18:33.348+0000)
>
> Huzzah for getting that S and your chest ^_^!  Seriously major props for getting an S on a champ that new!
> 
> But I'm a little confused as to what icon you're referring to for season highest score? Are you referring to the season highest grade on your collection page? If so, that should update soon, and you could try forcing an update by closing and reopening the client.

Yes, the season highest score is not showing i restarted but still not showing
ty for replying

Give it a little time and that score should update. If it's been a day or so and it still hasn't updated, feel free to hit us back up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can dig a little deeper!
